scripts.dev: bun run db:gen && cd apps/web && bun run dev
scripts.build: bun run db:gen && bun run type-check && cd apps/web && bun run build
scripts.test: cd apps/web && bun run test || true
scripts.test:all: bun run test && bun run test:e2e
scripts.pre-commit: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run test
scripts.ci: bun run type-check && bun run lint && bun run test && bun run test:e2e && bun run build
scripts.clean:cache: rm -rf apps/web/.next apps/web/.turbo && find . -name '*.tsbuildinfo' -type f -delete && find . -name '.turbo' -type d -exec rm -rf {} + 2>/dev/null || true
scripts.clean:prisma: rm -rf node_modules/@prisma node_modules/.prisma node_modules/prisma && bun install --force
scripts.clean:all: bun run clean:cache && bun run clean:deps
scripts.reset: bun run clean:all && bun install && bun run dev
scripts.rebuild: bun run fresh && bun run build
